channel.title: Do your stats still get reset after botting?
channel.description: Do your stats still get reset after botting?

item.title: Do your stats still get reset after botting?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:6, topic:376015”]You get banned the first time you get caught.

I did anyways. From 67-94 hunter and I got banned for 2 weeks.[/quote]
I had a similar experience. But this was 3-4 years ago, and I was using ghostmouse to high alc haha. But I was banned for 2 weeks, I’m not exactly sure how it works now. And anways, their policy might be changing once free trade is back, you never know.

Read full topic

item.title: Do your stats still get reset after botting?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Most definetally, but as long as you are not stupid with botting, you wont be caught. I fell asleep while testing out a new(ish) bot that I edited a bit. (Shortened the brakes it takes from 5-40 minutes down to 1-5 minutes). Anyways, it goes to show I never checked how the bot knew if you were out of feathers, so low and behold, when I ran out of feathers, it sat there for around 6 hours clicking on the fishing spot. Obviously a bot and my fishing was reset back to 63 from 72, but I got that back in a day lmfao.

Read full topic
